alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 5:08PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Elko County through 545 PM PDT... At 508 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Oasis, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oasis and Silver Zone Pass. Interstate 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
